name: Rumberry
description:
• Rumberry is an adventure 3D platform and puzzle game with combat.
  • Inspired by the Rumberas Films of the Golden Age of Mexican Cinema of the 1940s and 1950s.
  • Original soundtrack with a mix of rumba, mambo and cha-cha-cha.


Toñita and her fruits lived a happy life in the Fruitibbean.

Until one day, the rejected vegetables attacked her island.

And kidnapped all the fruits.

To offer them in the 'punch sacrifice' to the Troglodyte Gods.


Will Toñita be able to face them and get her fruits back?

Directed by Rodrigo Garrido

Executive Producer │ Ivan García

Programming │ Jonary Querti

Advisors │ Jon Kimmich and Leo Mendez

Testers │ Uriel Aguilar, Eli Carranza, Eret Jiménez, Xime Olvera and Pablo Pacheco

Production Baby │ Ryoji

Dedicated to our families.
